item.title: S3 Is Outstanding
item.description:
Do you all appreciate how insanely cheap and easy-to-use S3 is? I use it for home backups, and you should too.

S3 is Amazon's Simple Storage Service, part of Amazon Web Services. It's a document store. It is reliable and has basically infinite capacity, enough for your and my needs. The API has everyhing you need and is bound to
